qoutes.text: There's not a day that's gone by where I haven't thought about you. Running into you again feels like a missing piece of my life has finally clicked back into place.
You make me smile so easily. Can you be there, to do it forever?
I've missed you more than I ever thought possible.
Your absence is stronger to me than the presence of thousands of other people
Seeing you again after all this time feels like stepping back into a dream. I can't believe it's been five years. I've missed you more than words can say.

propose.text: Life took us down different paths for a while, but reconnecting with you feels like coming home. I really hope we can stay in touch and get to know each other again
